name: UCP Hoops Basketball Camp
description: UCP Hoops Basketball Camp is specifically tailored for all special needs athletes who want to learn some basketball fundamentals and team concepts in a supportive, positive and fun environment. Athletes participating in the Camp will be exposed to modified physical activity (dribbling, passing and shooting a basketball) and team concepts. Coaches are Coach Doug Senz and the basketball teams from Northgate, Miramonte and Cal Stars. No previous basketball experience is necessary.

howToGetIt: Contact Coach Doug Senz for further information to this event. Phone: (925) 890-8088 Email: DSENZSWIM@aol.com
agency: United Cerebral Palsy of the Golden Gate
